ygData.subject: RE: diamond dust?
ygData.msgSnippet: did anyone ever try the NPC who crushes gems for quests? might be worth looking into if not... Xillitil/Povar(who would try if he had a diamond and wasn t too
ygData.messageBody:
did anyone ever try the NPC who crushes gems for quests?
might be worth looking into if not...

Xillitil/Povar(who would try if he had a diamond and wasn't too low level to
advance tinkering anyway...stupid level caps)

>I've been looking for the Diamond Dust also... looked everywhere from LGukk
>to OOT over to Dagnors Cauldron and up on the Plane of Hate and found
>nothing... not even a rumor of it. If anyone finds it, please send it out
>to the list. Even rumors we can follow up on. Oh and I checked Sol A also
>in the gnome area over there and found nothing.
>
>Darkadvent - Cazic Thule
>
>aka Zindabus - Gnome Warrior
>
